aiModalSubtitle.message: Provide details below to help the AI create the best post for you.

appDescription.message: The #1 Facebook Group Auto Poster. Bulk post to FB groups, schedule campaigns, and generate content with AI. Safe & Ban-Free.

appName.message: Facebookâ„¢ Group Posting PRO: The #1 AI Auto Poster & Scheduler - FBâ„¢ Groups

backupMsg.message: Your Post Templates and Group Collections have been saved to a file.

bannerFeedbackDesc.message: Share your feedbackâ€”it only takes a minute.

campDeleteMsg.message: Are you sure? This will permanently remove this campaign and its history.

campRestartMsg.message: Campaign was finished, so it has been restarted from Step 1.

campWizPrompt1.message: Affiliate Marketing: Promote a software deal ending in 48 hours. Aggressive frequency.

campWizPrompt2.message: Real Estate: Showcase a new property. Teaser -> Features -> Open House.

campWizPrompt3.message: Small Biz: Launch a new menu item. Build hunger and offer a discount.

canvasEmpty.message: Drag the Trigger block here to start

catConfirmDel.message: Are you sure you want to delete the category "$NAME$"?

catErrLimit.message: You have reached the maximum limit of categories.

descAnonPost.message: Aborts if group doesn't allow it

descBackup.message: Saves templates and group collections (no media).

descDragDrop.message: Drag & drop files here or click the plus button

descEmptyCamp.message: Create your first automated strategy to get started.

descEmptySched.message: You haven't scheduled any posts yet.

descFormats.message: Supported formats: Images, MP4, WebM videos

descGenAiVar.message: Create variations with different tones automatically.

descPost.message: Run a Quick or Scheduled post.

descSafeDelay.message: Wait full time even if post fails.

descSkipNet.message: Enable this only if your posts get stuck on 'Connection unstable' despite having working internet.

descTelemetry.message: This helps us improve the extension. We never collect personal data or content.

enhBoostDesc.message: Maximize engagement with strong hooks and CTAs.

enhPolishDesc.message: Fix errors and improve clarity without changing the tone.

enhSpinDesc.message: Convert text into complex nested variations {A|B} for safety.

errConnectMsg.message: Could not reach the validation server. Please check your internet.

extractConfirmMsg.message:
A new, visible tab will open to your Facebook groups page. The extension will then scroll down automatically to find all your groups.

Please do not close this new tab; it will close itself when the process is finished.

fbSorry.message: We're sorry! How can we improve?

fileLargeMsg.message:
The following files are too large for the browser extension to handle directly:

$FILES$

Please compress them to under $SIZE$MB.

healthCleanupMsg.message: Removed $COUNT$ dead links from your collections.

healthFoundMsg.message: These groups are still in your collections but fail consistently.

healthSuccessMsg.message: No active groups found with consistent failure history inside any group collections.

helpEmailIntro.message: For technical issues, please write to us at:

helpPageIntro.message: Or visit our help page for guides and FAQs:

hintOrder.message: Sequential: A,A,A... then B,B,B... | Alternate: A,B,C... then A,B,C...

impErrEmpty.message: Please select a group collection and at least one link.

keyRemovedMsg.message: Your validation key has been removed successfully.

loadingNotify.message: Posting has started! You can browse other tabs - we'll continue in the background.

missedActionDesc.message: These one-time posts were not sent. Please choose an action for each.

modalConfirmDelBody.message: Are you sure you want to delete this scheduled post? This action cannot be undone.

modalDeleted.message: The scheduled post has been deleted.

modalLimitBody.message:
You selected $TOTAL$ groups, but the Free Tier is limited to $LIMIT$ per run.
We will only post to the first $ACTUAL$ groups.

modalNoGroups.message: Please select at least one group.

modalQueuedImmediate.message: The post has been queued to run immediately.

modalRunNowBody.message:
This will queue "$TITLE$" to start immediately.

The schedule will not be deleted and will continue to run at its future times.

modalSuccessQueue.message: The post has been queued and will start momentarily.

notifMissedRecur.message: The recurring post "$TITLE$" was missed on $DATE$. It has been automatically rescheduled.

overlayDesc.message: Please keep this browser window open. The automation will continue in the background and the tab will close automatically.

overlayDupRetry.message: Duplicate content detected. Automatically modifying and retrying...

overlayEnd.message: Reached end of list or no more joinable groups. Finishing.

overlayHumanPause.message: Pausing for a moment to appear more human... (Level: $LEVEL$)

overlayJoined.message:
($CURRENT$/$TOTAL$) Joined "$GROUP$".
Reminder: Joining too many groups quickly can flag your account.

overlayLongPause.message: Taking a longer break for safety ($SEC$s)...

overlayLonger.message: Taking longer than usual... ensuring browser priority.

overlayNoNew.message: No new joinable groups found. Attempt $ATTEMPT$/5...

overlayPendingVerify.message: Facebook says 'Pending', verifying if that's true...

overlaySaving.message: Saving joined groups to a new collection...

overlayScrapeEmpty.message: Scraping finished, but no valid groups were extracted.

overlayScrapeNoItems.message: Scraping finished, but no group items were found. Ensure English(US) language.

overlayScrapeSuccess.message:
SUCCESS! $COUNT$ groups were saved to a new collection named "$NAME$".

This tab will close automatically.

overlayScrolling.message: Scrolling to the bottom of the page...

overlaySlowLoad.message: Content is loading slowly, increasing delay to $MS$ ms.

overlayUploading.message: Media is uploading. This may take several minutes...

overlayWaitLoad.message: Scrolling & waiting for new content to load...

phSaveGroupAs.message: Enter group name to save as

phSelectGroups.message: Select one or more group collections...

phSelectTemplates.message: Select one or more post templates...

phTemplateName.message: Enter a name for this template

prevDisclaimer.message: This is a preview. Actual appearance may vary.

quillPhTemplate.message:
Start writing your post here...

Multi-level spintax is supported.
Use {option1|option2} to create a spintax.

rateBadReward.message: Your feedback directly helps us prioritize new features and fixes.

rateGoodReward.message: Your review helps other group admins find this tool!!

readyMsgAlternate.message: Sending 1 post to each of $GROUPS$ group(s) (cycling through $TEMPLATES$ templates).

readyMsgSequential.message: Sending $TEMPLATES$ template(s) to each of $GROUPS$ group(s).

restoreErrJson.message: Please select a valid JSON backup file.

restoreErrMsg.message: The file could not be read. It may be corrupted or in the wrong format. Error: $ERR$

restoreMsg.message: This will add $TAGS$ post templates and $GROUPS$ group collections to your existing data. Are you sure you want to continue?

restoreSuccessMsg.message: Successfully added $TAGS$ new templates and $GROUPS$ new collections.

retryMsg.message: Would you like to try sending the $COUNT$ failed or skipped post(s) again?

revText.message: Would you mind leaving a quick review?

schedErrPast.message: Scheduled time cannot be in the past.

secDescBalanced.message: Balances speed and safety with moderate, random delays. Recommended for most users.

secDescFast.message: Prioritizes speed with minimal delays. Best for established accounts.

secDescSafe.message: Prioritizes account safety with longer delays, focused tab and more human-like behavior. Slowest but safest.

spinErr.message: Please add at least one variation.

spinInstr.message: Add and preview variations for your text. (Use {option1|option2} format).

splitErrMin.message: You need at least 2 links to split.

splitErrValid.message: Please enter a valid number of pieces.

splitFeedbackMixed.message: Creates $PIECES$ collections. $BIG$ will have $L1$ links, $SMALL$ will have $L2$.

splitLblPieces.message: How many smaller collections do you want?

spotCampDesc.message: Chain posts, set delays, and loop indefinitely.

stuckReset.message: Posting stuck? - only in case of issues.

targeterDescFresh.message: Select groups you haven't posted to recently first (Fresh > Warm > Hot).

targeterLblRandom.message: Will post to $COUNT$ of them randomly.

targeterNoColls.message: No group collections found. Please create one on the "Groups" page first.

targeterSummaryInit.message: Select collections or groups to see options.

targeterSummaryMain.message: You have selected $COUNT$ unique target groups.

tipFmtBold.message: Try using bold text to emphasize points.

tipFmtHead.message: Consider adding headings to structure content.

tipFmtList.message: Bullet points make information easier to scan.

tipGroupsDesc.message: Organize groups by niche to target the right audience every time.

tipLenGood.message: Great job! Your post has a good length.

tipLenPerfect.message: Perfect! Your post has an ideal length for high engagement.

tipLenShort.message: Your post is on the shorter side. Adding more details could help.

tipLenStart.message: Start writing your post to see recommendations.

tipMediaAdd.message: Adding images or videos can significantly increase engagement.

tipMediaGood.message: Great job! Including media helps boost engagement.

tipMediaPerfect.message: Perfect! Multiple media items significantly increase engagement.

tipPolPhone.message: Phone numbers detected. This might trigger platform restrictions.

tipPolProf.message: Potentially problematic language detected. Consider revising.

tipSentEx.message: Excellent! Very positive tone likely to boost engagement.

tipTemplatesDesc.message: Templates save time and keep your messaging consistent.

tour1Text.message: The safest, most powerful way to automate your Facebook group outreach.

tour2Text.message: Start here. Create reusable Post Templates and organize your target groups into Collections.

tour3Text.message: Use Simple Post for quick blasts, or the Advanced Scheduler to plan posts ahead.

tour4Text.message: Build powerful workflows. Chain multiple posts, set specific delays, and loop your strategy.

tour5Text.message: View logs of every run. See what succeeded or failed, and retry with one click.

tour6Text.message: We've set up a few sample templates for you. Click below to start!

warnFbLimit.message: Facebook limits joins! Max 25 per day recommended.

warnOnline.message: Your browser must be open for posts to send.

warnQuick.message: Quick Post uses Classic mode & default settings.

wizBuildMsg.message: The AI generated a strategy, but we couldn't place it on the canvas. Error: $ERR$

wizEmptyMsg.message: The AI returned an empty strategy. Please try adding more detail to your goal.

wizEnterGoal.message: Please describe your campaign goal (e.g., 'Promote my webinar next Friday').

wizError.message: Connection failed. Please reload the extension and try again.

wizFailedMsg.message: The AI could not generate a strategy. Please try again or use a simpler prompt.

wizNoTemplate.message: Please select at least one template to use.

wizSuccessMsg.message:
AI successfully created $COUNT$ steps based on your goal.

Review the setup and click Save to launch!
